subject: Re: Some new additions for the 12-470... I hope
author: Lance Oliver
full_text:
What about reverse speech?

Has anyone considered trying to use this technique with voice 
recordings from the boxes? 

Lance

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <franks-boxes@...> 
wrote:
>
> 
>  Well, I can tell where that theory came from! It's been my 
experience, they use what we use, as long as it's something they can 
form voices out of. It's also been my experience that the combo 
noise/frag voice is what our own minds create. I suggest you play 
with EVPmaker, with clear raw audio, you'll find no white noise 
needed. 
>  
>  I don't get any mention of technicians, or anykind of 
helper/operators on the other side. They sometimes talk about a 
network, but I couldn't tell you what that is, or if it's real. 
>  
>  I think it's 99.99%PK. So not only do spirits, and other entities 
make voices, we can do it to, mostly unconciuosly. 
>  
>  Moon is still certain that it has to be random, despite the last 
several months of experiments that show the linear mode is far 
superior. 
>  
>  If someone could take a digital speech recordng, stored in memory, 
and chop it up, and play it back over a speaker, I think it would 
work just as well as radio. You could get live voices, answers to 
questions, and never replace the raw audio. This is in fact EVPmaker, 
but it would be nice to have it portable. EVPmaker pretty much took 
all the mystery out of this, and it's all but igonred. My system, and 
analog version of EVPmaker using technologies I had worked wiht in 
the past. My mind did kind of assemble all the elements, so I got an 
image of the complete system. 
>  
>  I thought I knew how the voices in my boxes worked at one 
time..now I have no idea!
>  
>  Frank-S
>  
>  
> 
> 
> To: EVP-ITC@...: michaelcoletta@...: Mon, 3 Dec 2007 00:22:35 
+0000Subject: [EVP-ITC] Some new additions for the 12-470... I hope
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Excuse me if I mispell some things in this post, I'm currently 
running the production board for a LIVE internet radion program going 
on right now, and I'm doing 100 things at once!Okay... According to 
some, "...the Spirit Technicians and Spirit Guides on the other side 
have repeatedly explained that the way that the Telephone to the Dead 
technology works, is by spirit energy manipulating the random voltage 
generator (RVG) and using white and pink noise, as well as radio 
fragment, to create real time voice answers to questions posed from 
our side. The most important aspect to this device is the medium 
operator who works as an antenna or "interpreter" for living 
individuals asking the questions."So, that said (or copied and 
pasted) I have decided that my next attempt with the older version of 
the 12-470 will be the following:1) Add a method of variable voltage 
used to adjust the tuning circuit, similar to the RVG mentioned 
above. I went out and purchased another older 12-470 today, to do 
just this.(Frank... I did some measurements of that VT and found a 
range to work with.. I hope!)2) Add that white or pink noise to be 
mixed with the sweeping raw audio already available from the modified 
12-470.3) Add an internal antenna for the 12-470.4) Add an interface 
so the user will be a active/passive part of the radio. As mentioned 
above, as the antenna between the entities/spirits.So... if I can 
accomplish all that... maybe the little ole' 12-470 will be 
recognized by the "experts", as having what the big mahcines now 
have... :-)Wish me luck in my adventure... and oh, by-the-way... I 
hope to add all this, inside the existing case.- Mike 
> 
> 
> 
>
